meanings.sent1: The limy walls of the old house crumbled easily.
meanings.sent2: The limy taste of the water indicated high mineral content.
meanings.sent3: The limy sidewalk made the kids slip and slide like penguins.
meanings.sent4: Her limy smile brightened up the room like a ray of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The limy texture of the soil felt cool and smooth to the touch.

meanings.sent1: The limy paint on the walls gave the room a fresh look.
meanings.sent2: Her limy hair shone in the sunlight like a golden halo.
meanings.sent3: The limy clouds in the sky looked like fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent4: His limy voice echoed through the empty hallways like a haunting melody.
meanings.sent5: The limy scent of the flowers filled the room with a sweet fragrance.

meanings.definition: Consisting of or containing calcium carbonate
meanings.sent1: The limy rocks along the shore sparkled in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The limy shells on the beach crunched underfoot.
meanings.sent3: The limy water in the lake made the fish swim lazily.
meanings.sent4: The limy cliffs towered above the crashing waves like ancient guardians.
meanings.sent5: The limy deposits in the cave formed stunning stalactites and stalagmites.
